title: Season - Rathausmarkt
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, Buffet, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, German
description: Second location just one block from its other location, opened summer 2013 after renovation. This is a vegetarian buffet restaurant. Buy by weight or all-you-can-eat. Vegans need to inquire about ingredients.
